results.title: India’s Covid-19 Crisis Shakes Modi’s Image of Strength
results.abstract: Overconfidence and missteps contributed to the country’s devastating second wave, his critics say, tarnishing the prime minister’s aura of political invulnerability.
results.byline: By Jeffrey Gettleman, Hari Kumar, Karan Deep Singh and Sameer Yasir
